body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-104 et-tb-has-template et-tb-has-footer tribe-no-js et_monarch et_pb_button_helper_class et_fixed_nav et_show_nav et_secondary_nav_enabled et_secondary_nav_two_panels et_primary_nav_dropdown_animation_fade et_secondary_nav_dropdown_animation_fade et_header_style_left et_cover_background et_pb_gutter et_pb_gutters3 et_pb_pagebuilder_layout et_no_sidebar et_divi_theme et-db et_minified_js et_minified_css

img.alt: Young Scholars of McKeesport Charter School

div.p: Quality education should not be expensive. Here at Young Scholars Charter School, we offer top-quality education for free!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_section_parallax_hover et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark

div.p: People who speak more than one language have improved memory, problem-solving and critical-thinking skills, enhanced concentration, ability to multitask, and better listening skills.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_1 et_hover_enabled et_pb_section_parallax_hover et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark

div.p: Our extended day programs are specially designed for students whose parents work beyond school hours. Click to learn more!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_2 et_hover_enabled et_pb_section_parallax_hover et_pb_promo et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_bg_layout_dark

p.span: YSMCS offers STEM Education to instill young scholars with reasoning, creativity, and critical thinking skills that provide students with opportunities, and resources in applying their interests, knowledge, and creative ideas to real-life challenges.

div.p: There are many reasons to join YSMCS. Among many check some below!

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-48552 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.p: The 5th Annual YSMCS Winter Concert was a huge success! Thank you to all who came to watch our students perform, and a special thanks to our scholars and staff at YSMCS for the outstanding performance. Our event took place at the Penn State...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-47643 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.p: The Nutrition Group hosted the Zoomobile at YSMCS!! The Nutrition Group is our food provider. They worked with the Zoomobile to come to the school and present about different animals, including their habitats and eating habits. Students were introduced to three...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix post-47641 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

div.p: Thank you to all of the families and friends who attended our Annual Thanksgiving Dinner!!! We were so grateful to have this time to come together as a community.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_9 et_clickable et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

p.span: Your support ignites possibility and ensures we are equal to our students’ aspirations day by day. Together, we inspire new discoveries and transformative experiences that lead to positive change in the world.

div.h2: YOUNG SCHOLARS OF MCKEESPORT CHARTER SCHOOL

div.p: ABOUT US | ADMISSIONS | REQUEST A SCHOOL TOUR | ACADEMIC CALENDAR | ONLINE TOOLS | DONATE
